ts-init.name: Initialize the TypeScript client
ts-init.prompt: Using the AcmeAuth TypeScript SDK (`@acmeauth/sdk`), write a script in solution.ts that initializes the AcmeAuth client with an API key from the environment and fetches a user by ID. Add the dependency to package.json. Do not run the program.
ts-init.description: AcmeAuth SDK â€” multi-language authentication client covering API keys, OAuth, JWT, pagination, webhooks, and error handling

assertions.command: npx -p typescript tsc --noEmit --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 solution.ts
assertions.name: typecheck

py-init.name: Initialize the Python client
py-init.prompt: Using the AcmeAuth Python SDK (`acmeauth`), write a script in solution.py that initializes the AcmeAuth client with an API key and fetches a user by ID.

ts-rate-limit.name: Handle rate limit errors in TypeScript
ts-rate-limit.prompt: Write TypeScript code in solution.ts that calls the AcmeAuth API (`@acmeauth/sdk`) and properly handles rate limit (429) errors using the SDK's typed error classes. Add the dependency to package.json. Do not run the program.

assertions.command: npx -p typescript tsc --noEmit --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 solution.ts
assertions.name: typecheck

ts-webhooks.name: Verify webhook signatures
ts-webhooks.prompt: Write TypeScript code in solution.ts that verifies incoming AcmeAuth webhook signatures using the SDK (`@acmeauth/sdk`). Add the dependency to package.json. Do not run the program.

assertions.command: npx -p typescript tsc --noEmit --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 solution.ts
assertions.name: typecheck

ts-pagination.name: Paginate through users
ts-pagination.prompt: Write TypeScript code in solution.ts that lists all AcmeAuth users using the SDK (`@acmeauth/sdk`), handling pagination correctly. Add the dependency to package.json. Do not run the program.

assertions.command: npx -p typescript tsc --noEmit --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 solution.ts
assertions.name: typecheck

py-async.name: Python async client usage
py-async.prompt: Write Python code in solution.py that uses the AcmeAuth async client to fetch a user.

ts-oauth.name: OAuth authentication setup
ts-oauth.prompt: Explain how OAuth 2.0 authentication works with AcmeAuth and write TypeScript code in solution.ts that initializes the client (`@acmeauth/sdk`) with an OAuth access token. Add the dependency to package.json. Do not run the program.

assertions.command: npx -p typescript tsc --noEmit --esModuleInterop --moduleResolution node --module commonjs --target es2020 solution.ts
assertions.name: typecheck

rate-limit-guide.name: Cross-cutting: rate limits and best practices
rate-limit-guide.prompt: What are the rate limits for each AcmeAuth plan tier, and what are the recommended best practices for staying within limits?

webhook-guide.name: Webhook event types and retry policy
webhook-guide.prompt: List all webhook event types that AcmeAuth supports and describe the retry policy for failed deliveries.

jwt-verification.name: JWT token verification
jwt-verification.prompt: Explain how to verify AcmeAuth JWT tokens locally, including what claims are in the token and where to find the public keys.
